Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Game Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Piece of Heart#.
